PARAMETER.NAME: ENABLE_SECURITY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'false') OR (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'false'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SECURITY_TYPE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'false') OR (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'false'))

PARAMETER.NAME: AUTHENTICATION_LABEL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SAML_SECURITY_TYPES
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'false') OR (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'false')) AND ((ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND (SECURITY_TYPE=='SAML'))

PARAMETER.NAME: PROPAGATE_UP_LABEL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SAML_SECURITY_TYPES == 'PROPAGATE_UP' ) AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND ( ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true')) OR ( (ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND (SECURITY_TYPE=='SAML') AND ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'false') OR (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'false')) ))

PARAMETER.NAME: PROPAGATE_AP_LABEL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SAML_SECURITY_TYPES == 'PROPAGATE_AP' ) AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND ( ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true')) OR ( (ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND (SECURITY_TYPE=='SAML') AND ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'false') OR (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'false')) ))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_PROPAGATE_CREDENTIAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0')

PARAMETER.NAME: ALIASNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND ( ((IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (USE_PROPAGATE_CREDENTIAL == 'true')) OR ((ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND (SECURITY_TYPE == 'SAML') AND (SAML_SECURITY_TYPES=='PROPAGATE_AP') AND ((IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION=='false') OR ((ENABLE_REGISTRY=='false') AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true'))) ) )

PARAMETER.NAME: USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ( ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true')) OR ((ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND ((SECURITY_TYPE != 'SAML') OR (SAML_SECURITY_TYPES != 'PROPAGATE_AP')) )) AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true')) OR (ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true')) AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_AUTHORIZATION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND (SECURITY_TYPE == 'SAML' ) AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'false')

PARAMETER.NAME: AUTHORIZATION_LABEL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: ROLE_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'CXF_MESSAGE')) AND ((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') OR ((ENABLE_SECURITY == 'true') AND (SECURITY_TYPE == 'SAML' ) AND (USE_AUTHORIZATION == 'true' )))

PARAMETER.NAME: CORRELATION_VALUE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (DATAFORMAT != 'RAW') AND ((#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND (((IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD'))) OR (ENABLE_CORRELATION == 'true'))) OR (ENABLE_CORRELATION == 'true')))

PARAMETER.NAME: CORRELATION_VALUE_TOOLTIP
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (DATAFORMAT != 'RAW') AND ((#LINK@CONNECTOR.IN.ANY > '0') AND (((IS_STUDIO_EE_VERSION == 'true') AND (((ENABLE_REGISTRY == 'true') AND ((DATAFORMAT == 'POJO') OR ( DATAFORMAT == 'PAYLOAD'))) OR (ENABLE_CORRELATION == 'true'))) OR (ENABLE_CORRELATION == 'true')))
